com.io7m.jcamera

Class JCameraFPSStyleInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jcamera.JCameraFPSStyleInput

  • @EqualityReference
public final class JCameraFPSStyleInput
extends Object

    An input for an fps-style camera.

    It is safe to access values of this type from multiple threads.
